title: I need someone to help me with my ticket...
body:
I've been waiting over 3 days to get a response from someone who works for Riot and still have yet to even receive a confirmation that anyone will help me at all. Can someone look over my ticket please? REQUEST #23148125

- Thank you.

replies.body:
Your ticket was sent successfully and is currently awaiting a specialist to pick it up. We've been pretty slammed lately, so response times are a bit longer than normal. I can't specify an exact time when someone will get back to you, but our team is working their butts off to get back to everyone as soon as possible.

I appreciate your patience. Please let me know if you have any other questions.
